name: Christmas Fairy
description:
first of all i want to take the whole team who helped with this game! first off to Ryan our programmer for this whole game, he has stuck with me since the last game jam and has been an amazing and reliable programmer, he has done gods work these past 2 days and he has all of my respect!

Secondly to Nany for being the leader of the artists and taking action when I was clueless when it came to art! she did amazing last minute work and helped so much as well!

Third to Anna for deciding to jump in and helping out so much as well with characters and the entire environment of the game! if it wasn't for her i would have done maps and made the game look a lower quality so she was amazing help!

Fourth Val. to help me out with drawing the items within the game i had to do some of them as well, but she assisted me when i started to feel overwhelmed with the list of 54 items in total so huge thanks to her!

(And fifth Kim for telling me that i had to zip the game in order to publish it xD)

now to the game!
You are secretly a Christmas fairy that has been charged to gift unlucky people that wont be receiving any gifts this Christmas! but you dont know them very well so you must find out clues about them and make sure you get their best gift possible, the more they like it the more points you get! but watch out because some information might be false or misleading.
